posts.post_content: In the market for a low grade (slabbed or raw) N28 King Kelly. Not trimmed, not skinned, no writing on the front of the card. Other than that I'll look at anything. Please let me know if you have something available. Thank you.
bump - still looking for Kelly if anyone has anything

Ed (dacubfan) just posted a King Kelly this morning 
A beautiful 2!

David Levin (gfg.com) has a nice N28 Mike Kelly SGC1 on his website:
